Text: Leitzge: Just search for Pure.Pwnage.S03E01.720p. That is episode one of the TV show.
Okay thanks, any particular reason for that?
also isnt this Season 3 not Season 1? or do people just not care about the online seasons?

Well it looks like the release group had a discussion with the consensus that the notation should only take the TV series into account. It's kinda unfortunate that they did this -- they should at least re-release the first episode as S01E01.

@NanaFreak

Not that they nobody cares about the online series, but this is the first season of the tv show

Season 03 01 is the 1st ep? thanks for the info. 

It should be Season 1 too. Since the TV show is seperate from the online series right? I know they are going to do more web shows. at least that's what I heard last time I was on their site.
